title: Performance and Power Analysis of 5G Networks
description: This project studies commercial 5G networks, analyzing performance, power consumption, and QoE across carriers, deployment schemes, radio bands, and applications. It compares 5G with 4G/LTE, highlighting key trade-offs in speed, latency, and energy efficiency. Findings optimize 5G usage, with datasets/tools available at GitHub

title: Dice Noti
description: Dice Noti is a real-time event monitoring system using Scrapy, RabbitMQ, Celery, and AWS. It scrapes 10,000+ events daily, processes notifications asynchronously, and delivers targeted email alerts. Optimized with Django ORM & PostgreSQL, it reduces query time by 30% and is deployed on AWS for scalability and efficient processing.
